column3: Nicholasville Rd Football Game Lane Configuration Schedule:
column4: 4:30 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. - 3 lanes inbound and 1 lane outbound.

column3: Nicholasville Rd Football Game Lane Configuration Schedule:
column4: 7:30 p.m. to 10:30 p.m. - Normal lane configuration.

column3: Nicholasville Rd Football Game Lane Configuration Schedule:
column4: 10:30 p.m. to 1 a.m. - 3 lanes outbound and 1 lane inbound.

Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:

column3: Tates Creek Rd at Alumni Dr:
